name: Project Resistance Boys
description:
Welcome to Project Resistance Boys.

It is a puzzle game I made as a project for school.

You try to wipe out all the enemies from the field by placing your characters on the right positions. The game consists of 22 levels.

Have fun and don't forget leave a comment and let me know what you think.

Stay safe and have a nice day.

Credits and other info:

Music and sound effects by:

- Sound from Zapsplat.com

-Music used from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

Special thanks to the people from:

Luca School Of Arts - Game design

Belgium, Limburg, C-MINE 5
3600 Genk
